== New Features ==
** Add --pm-method option
** Add support for logind and sysfs methods to the S3power and to the S4 tests
** Add new ACPI 5.1 MADT stuctures and checks (LP: #1348581)
** Add new ACPI 5.1 FADT fields and update acpidump (LP: #1348598)
** Add the status error report for the IP addr conflict (LP: #1356195)
** Add test for setvariable with both authenticated attributes are set (LP: #1356207)
** Add backward compatibility with older glib releases
** Change GTDT field names in ACPI 5.1 (LP: #1350170)
** Update man page since --pm-method parameter also applies to S4
** Update contributors in man page
** ACPICA: update to version 20140724 (LP: #1348342)
** Re-work iASL backand and API to handle externals (LP: #1317390)

== Fixed Bugs ==
** Fix up GTDT corrections as in ACPI 5.1 (LP: #1348618)
** setvariable without deleting the original variable (LP: #1354301)
** Add the variable attribute definition for append write (LP: #1356194)
** Skip test when specific attributes not supported (LP: #1356199)
** s3: fix multiple s3 tests stop working (LP: #1359037)

== Known Issues ==
** Does not support Ubuntu 10.04 LTS (Lucid Lynx)
